actions.committee: House Committee on the District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the District of Columbia.

official_title: A bill to amend the Washington Area Transit Authority Compact to require the inclusion of rail commuter service in the mass transit plan, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Requires, under the Washington Area Transit Authority Compact, the inclusion of rail commuter service in the mass transit plan.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Washington Area Transit Authority Compact to require the inclusion of rail commuter service in the mass transit plan, and for other purposes.
